```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(chartjs)
```

## Bar

```{r bar}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsBar(labels = LETTERS[1:10], scaleLabel = list(display = TRUE, labelString = "topkek")) %>%
  cjsAddScale("y", type = "linear") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3") %>% 
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```

## Line

```{r line}
chartjs(height = "500px") %>%
  cjsLine(labels = seq.Date(as.Date("2011-01-01"), as.Date("2011-01-08"), by = 1), type = "time") %>%
  cjsAddScale("y", type = "logarithmic") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 1") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 2") %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = abs(c(rnorm(8))), label = "Series 3") %>% 
  cjsLegend() %>% 
  cjsTooltips(fontSize = 20, fontColor = "#F00000")
```


## Pie 

```{r pie}
chartjs() %>%
  cjsPie(labels = LETTERS[1:4]) %>%
  cjsAddSeries(data = c(1:4))
```
